ns2:test-suite.name: A registered user can pay by available Payment methods
ns2:test-suite.title: A registered user can pay by available Payment methods

test-case.name: User can make payment by cash
test-case.title: User can make payment by cash

label.name: feature
label.value: A registered user can pay by available Payment methods

step.name: user navigates to Make Payments page an selects payment method "Cash"
step.title: user navigates to Make Payments page an selects payment method "Cash"

step.name: user pays with amount "84" and enters receipt number to submit
step.title: user pays with amount "84" and enters receipt number to submit

step.name: cash payment is successful with message "You have successfully completed your CASH payment!"
step.title: cash payment is successful with message "You have successfully completed your CASH payment!"

failure.message: An element could not be located on the page using the given search parameters ("//a[text()='Make Payment']").

step.title: user recieves payment successful message "You have successfully completed your Electronic Check Payment!"
